Package space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.proxy

Interface ProxySpec

public interface ProxySpec
The specification of a proxy class, provides definition info of the proxy class and methods to create its instances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> T
    newInstance()
    Creates and returns a new instance of the proxy class.
    @Nonnull Class<?>
    proxiedClass()
    Returns the proxied class, which is typically the superclass of the proxyClass().
    @Nonnull List<@Nonnull Class<?>>
    proxiedInterfaces()
    Returns the proxied interfaces, which are typically the interfaces implemented by proxyClass().
    @Nonnull Class<?>
    proxyClass()
    Returns the proxy class defined by this specification.
    @Nonnull ProxyHandler
    proxyHandler()
    Returns the proxy handler, which is used to handle the proxy behavior.

  • Method Details

    • newInstance

      @Nonnull <T> T newInstance() throws ProxyException
      Creates and returns a new instance of the proxy class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the instance
      Returns:
      a new instance of the proxy class
      Throws:
      ProxyException - if any problem occurs

    • proxyClass

      @Nonnull @Nonnull Class<?> proxyClass()
      Returns the proxy class defined by this specification.

      the proxy class defined by this specification

      @Nonnull @Nonnull Class<?> proxiedClass()

      @Nonnull @Nonnull List<@Nonnull Class<?>> proxiedInterfaces()

      Returns:

    • proxyHandler

      @Nonnull @Nonnull ProxyHandler proxyHandler()
      Returns the proxy handler, which is used to handle the proxy behavior. The handler typically is the handler argument of ProxyMaker.make(Class, List, ProxyHandler).
      Returns:
      the proxy handler, which is used to handle the proxy behavior
